revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: An essay towards a new English version of the Book of Job, from the original Hebrew, with a commentary, and some account of his life. By Thomas Heath, Esq. of Exeter..."
revision.text: Possibly: An essay towards a new English version of the Book of Job, from the original Hebrew, with a commentary, and some account of his life. By Thomas Heath, Esq. of Exeter. (London : Printed for A. Millar in the Strand, and S. Baker in York-Street, Covent-Garden; and sold by Mr. Tozer, and Mr. Thorn, booksellers at Exeter, MDCCLVI. [1756]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2510574~S1
